Text:
Please someone to explain to the Newbie: How this tool is working?
I will appreciate any answers.

Thank you

simple applescript what changes date for first run your crossover app to year 2050 example. 
..always you can right click on app and 'show package contenst' and in folder 'resources' you will see folder 'scripts' there you find script what you can view with applescript editor. you will see what that script can do or what for is it 

..or if you don't trust that uploader or you don't know what do do with these files, better don't download :)
7117 is right :) just click to run and voila. :)

Thank you guys.
One more question please: Must I do these actions before or after the crossover's first run?
I am asking because I haven't use crossover ever before.
After you have run crossover (don't forget to close it first before applying extender)

..you have two weeks to run script, crossover trial is usually 15 days.

..In comic strips, the person on the left always speaks first  :)

Thank you!
Everything went very well.
Thanks to the "leftist" and the rest.... :lol:
Good guys!
Crossover runs but when I start an app there is a warning about trial expired .....days ago. So is worthless.

I had 7 days left on my trial, 
..downloaded and ran this little gem..
..works like a charm..now i have 10,634 days on my "free trial"!!!
this is true sweetness!!!
thank you
